A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Okay I get it\, woman can be strong\, men can be wrong\, and you took a philosophy class your freshman year of college. Now\, can I please have my Star Wars back. I'm not asking for much\, just an interesting well developed lead character\, a thought-out story\, and at least one epic lightsaber battle. Really\, you don't need to use Star Wars to push your views anymore.
